column4: anyone got an idea why only one site's images aren't working for me? I checkedblacklists etc, and nothing
checked blacklists*
what blacklists? Some adblock?
no, blacklists as in blocking things. there are none on this pc
do you have any adblock installed then?
nope
are you behind a proxy?
facebook's avatars aren't loading up, and this is recient. I asked friends theysay it's fine for them
no, not at al, nothing's changed anyway over months
Facebook was under maintenance about 30 minutes ago, maybe that could be related.
I just had someone check, they see them, I don't
have you tried with a different browser? (just to make sure the browser is not the problem)
I don't have anotherone on this box, and it's never caused an issue till very eciently
but something is causing the problem and you don't know what. It wouldn't be a good idea to try a different browser just in case.
I'm using Firefox updated to latest
VLC doesn't need codecs.
I'e neded codecs on vlc
I believe totem uses gstreamer. I could be wrong, though.
no idea either way tbh
I found GIMP MUCH more organised than photoshop lol

cache?
